titleStmt.title: A plain testimony to the antient truth and work of God and against the corruption of the clergy, and their upholders. By T. G.
titleStmt.author: Goodaire, Thomas, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by T. Sowle, at the Crooked-Billet in Holywell-Lane, in Shoreditch,
